2 - odds are the owner of this topic does not use moparscape anymore, look at his rep…

item.title: RELEASED: The real Emote tab with scrollbar!
item.dc:creator: @blood_isle blood isle
item.description:
@blood_isle wrote:

jairiya is nothing but a leecher and doesn’t no **** about custom interfaces. Ive decided to add a scrollbar and new emotes to my old emote tab which was decompiled and released unauthorised. Later on i will be releasing some amazing custom interfaces which i havent even released on my own server yet.

Make sure you have completed my Prayer interface tutorialand you have it working 100%

Now, download and add these sprites to the [QUOTE]./signframe/custom/ [/QUOTE] folder which you should have made in my last tutorial. You will be replacing my old emote tab sprites with much cleaner ones. Click here to download sprites

Now open class9.java and search for

aClass44 = class44;

Under that add

EmoteTab();

Now search for

Tab.aString248 = "70 / 70";

And just before the last

}

add

////////////////////////////////newemotetab/////////////////////////////// Tab = addTab(19101); Tab.anInt236 = 19100; Tab.anInt250 = 19101; Tab.anInt262 = 0; Tab.anInt217 = 0; Tab.anInt214 = 0; Tab.anInt220 = 169; Tab.anInt267 = 260; Tab.aByte254 = 0; Tab.anInt230 = -1; Tab.anInt261 = 450; Tab.aBoolean266 = false;//boolean Tab.anIntArray240 = new int[1]; Tab.anIntArray241 = new int[1]; Tab.anIntArray272 = new int[1]; Tab.anIntArray240[0] = 19000; Tab.anIntArray241[0] = 0; Tab.anIntArray272[0] = 0; public static void EmoteTab() { Class9 Tab = addTab(19000); addSpellClick(19001, 0, 0, "Yes"); //addSpellClick(19002, 1, 1, "Scroll Bar"); addSpellClick(19003, 2, 2, "No"); addSpellClick(19004, 3, 3, "Bow"); addSpellClick(19005, 4, 4, "Angry"); addSpellClick(19006, 5, 5, "Think"); addSpellClick(19007, 6, 6, "Wave"); addSpellClick(19008, 7, 7, "Shrug"); addSpellClick(19009, 8, 8, "Cheer"); addSpellClick(19010, 9, 9, "Beckon"); addSpellClick(19011, 10, 10, "Laugh"); addSpellClick(19012, 11, 11, "Jump for Joy"); addSpellClick(19013, 12, 12, "Yawn"); addSpellClick(19014, 13, 13, "Dance"); addSpellClick(19015, 14, 14, "Jig"); addSpellClick(19016, 15, 15, "Spin"); addSpellClick(19017, 16, 16, "Headbang"); addSpellClick(19018, 17, 17, "Cry"); addSpellClick(19019, 18, 18, "Panic"); addSpellClick(19020, 19, 19, "Raspberry"); addSpellClick(19021, 20, 19, "SkillCape"); addSpellClick(19107, 33, 33, "Clap"); addSpellClick(19108, 34, 34, "Salute"); addSpellClick(19109, 35, 35, "Goblin Bow"); addSpellClick(19110, 36, 36, "Goblin Dance"); addSpellClick(19111, 93, 93, "Glass Box"); addSpellClick(19112, 94, 94, "Climb Rope"); addSpellClick(19113, 95, 95, "Lean"); addSpellClick(19114, 96, 96, "Glass Wall"); addSpellClick(19115, 37, 37, "Zombie Walk"); addSpellClick(19116, 38, 38, "Zombie Run"); addSpellClick(19117, 91, 91, "Scared"); addSpellClick(19118, 92, 92, "Stomp"); addSpellClick(19119, 97, 97, "Blow Kiss"); Tab.anInt261 = 260; Tab.aBoolean266 = false; Tab.anIntArray240 = new int[33]; Tab.anIntArray241 = new int[33]; Tab.anIntArray272 = new int[33]; Tab.anIntArray240[0] = 19001; Tab.anIntArray241[0] = 3; Tab.anIntArray272[0] = 5; Tab.anIntArray240[1] = 19003; Tab.anIntArray241[1] = 47; Tab.anIntArray272[1] = 5; Tab.anIntArray240[2] = 19004; Tab.anIntArray241[2] = 91; Tab.anIntArray272[2] = 12; Tab.anIntArray240[3] = 19005; Tab.anIntArray241[3] = 130; Tab.anIntArray272[3] = 5; Tab.anIntArray240[4] = 19006; Tab.anIntArray241[4] = 2; Tab.anIntArray272[4] = 54; Tab.anIntArray240[5] = 19007; Tab.anIntArray241[5] = 40; Tab.anIntArray272[5] = 54; Tab.anIntArray240[6] = 19008; Tab.anIntArray241[6] = 88; Tab.anIntArray272[6] = 54; Tab.anIntArray240[7] = 19009; Tab.anIntArray241[7] = 130; Tab.anIntArray272[7] = 54; Tab.anIntArray240[8] = 19010; Tab.anIntArray241[8] = 0; Tab.anIntArray272[8] = 103; Tab.anIntArray240[9] = 19011; Tab.anIntArray241[9] = 43; Tab.anIntArray272[9] = 103; Tab.anIntArray240[10] = 19012; Tab.anIntArray241[10] = 88; Tab.anIntArray272[10] = 102; Tab.anIntArray240[11] = 19013; Tab.anIntArray241[11] = 132; Tab.anIntArray272[11] = 103; Tab.anIntArray240[12] = 19014; Tab.anIntArray241[12] = 1; Tab.anIntArray272[12] = 152; Tab.anIntArray240[13] = 19015; Tab.anIntArray241[13] = 42; Tab.anIntArray272[13] = 152; Tab.anIntArray240[14] = 19016; Tab.anIntArray241[14] = 83; Tab.anIntArray272[14] = 152; Tab.anIntArray240[15] = 19017; Tab.anIntArray241[15] = 128; Tab.anIntArray272[15] = 152; Tab.anIntArray240[16] = 19018; Tab.anIntArray241[16] = 2; Tab.anIntArray272[16] = 202; Tab.anIntArray240[17] = 19119; Tab.anIntArray241[17] = 45; Tab.anIntArray272[17] = 201; Tab.anIntArray240[18] = 19019; Tab.anIntArray241[18] = 93; Tab.anIntArray272[18] = 202; Tab.anIntArray240[19] = 19020; Tab.anIntArray241[19] = 131; Tab.anIntArray272[19] = 202; Tab.anIntArray240[20] = 19107; Tab.anIntArray241[20] = 5; Tab.anIntArray272[20] = 251; Tab.anIntArray240[21] = 19108; Tab.anIntArray241[21] = 48; Tab.anIntArray272[21] = 251; Tab.anIntArray240[22] = 19109; Tab.anIntArray241[22] = 83; Tab.anIntArray272[22] = 256; Tab.anIntArray240[23] = 19110; Tab.anIntArray241[23] = 133; Tab.anIntArray272[23] = 250; Tab.anIntArray240[24] = 19111; Tab.anIntArray241[24] = 0; Tab.anIntArray272[24] = 301; Tab.anIntArray240[25] = 19112; Tab.anIntArray241[25] = 47; Tab.anIntArray272[25] = 300; Tab.anIntArray240[26] = 19113; Tab.anIntArray241[26] = 91; Tab.anIntArray272[26] = 300; Tab.anIntArray240[27] = 19114; Tab.anIntArray241[27] = 135; Tab.anIntArray272[27] = 300; Tab.anIntArray240[28] = 19115; Tab.anIntArray241[28] = 7; Tab.anIntArray272[28] = 350; Tab.anIntArray240[29] = 19116; Tab.anIntArray241[29] = 48; Tab.anIntArray272[29] = 350; Tab.anIntArray240[30] = 19117; Tab.anIntArray241[30] = 92; Tab.anIntArray272[30] = 354; Tab.anIntArray240[31] = 19118; Tab.anIntArray241[31] = 137; Tab.anIntArray272[31] = 352; Tab.anIntArray240[32] = 19021; Tab.anIntArray241[32] = 3; Tab.anIntArray272[32] = 399; }

Next search for

public static Class9

Replace that WHOLE method with

public static Class9 addTab(int id) { Class9 Tab = aClass9Array210[id] = new Class9(); Tab.anInt250 = id;//250 Tab.anInt236 = id;//236 Tab.anInt262 = 0;//262 Tab.anInt217 = 0;//217 Tab.anInt214 = 0; Tab.anInt220 = 512;//220 Tab.anInt267 = 700;//anint267 Tab.aByte254 = (byte)0; Tab.anInt230 = -1;//Int 230 return Tab; }

Close Class9.java and compile. Hope that you dont get any errors

==================SERVER SIDE!===================
note: I was unable to find the emote ids for…
Blow Kiss, Goblin bow, Goblin dance, zombie walk, zombie run. Would be nice if you could PM me them :whistle:

search for

Case 168 if you dont have that then go to a place were you would normally add cases.

Add

[CODE]case 74057: //Yes
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
startAnimation(855);
break;

case 74059: //No
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
startAnimation(856);
break;

case 74060: //Bow
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
startAnimation(858);
break;

case 74061: //Angry
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
startAnimation(859);
break;

case 74062: //Think
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
startAnimation(857);
break;
case 74063: //Wave
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
startAnimation(863);
break;
case 74064: //Shrug
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
startAnimation(2113);
break;
case 74065: //Cheer
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
startAnimation(862);
break;
case 74066: //Beckon
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
startAnimation(864);
break;
case 74067: //Laugh
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
startAnimation(861);
break;
case 74068: //Jump For Joy
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;

break;
case 74069: //Yawn

break;

//case 74175: //blow kiss

//break;

break

case 74077: { //skillcape
capeEmote();
}
[/CODE]

Under

public class client extends Player implements Runnable { at the very top…

Add

[CODE]public void capeEmote() {
if (playerEquipment[playerCape] == 14073) { //attack
